title: Rescue the gnome
content:
ns.

Stop the windmill.

The goblins attacked us. We've defeated the goblins. If we want to help the gnome, we'll have to stop the windmill. Now that that the windmill has stopped spinning, we should be able to untie the gnome.

It took some convincing, but the goblins left. If we want to help the gnome, we'll have to stop the windmill. (if the goblins were persuaded to leave instead)

Quest Completed!

After rescuing Barcus Wroot, we parted ways with him.
